start.description_of_area: You find yourself in a small dilapidated cottage.

north.description: To the north there is a door exiting this old cottage
north.actionText: As I open the old door it creaks loudly.

west.actionText: An old wooden wall with no windows or doors is to my we st, I cannot pass.

garden.description-of-area: I close it gently behind me and find myself in a small overgrown garden with a large forest all around me.

north.description: To the north lies a small but rapid stream, with a small wooden walkway allowing passage over it onto a winding path leading into the forest.
north.actionText:
As I cross the walkway it bend beneath my weight, barely supporting me. I manage to cross successfully into the forest and find myself in a clearing. 
 In the center of the clearing lies a small pile of leaves.

south.description: Leads back inside the small cottage.
south.actionText: I make my way back inside the small, old cottage.

east.description: The forest here is too thick to pass through.

west.description: The forest here is too thick to pass through.
